author: pdteam
info.description: An MX record was detected. MX records direct emails to a mail exchange server.

;; flags: rd; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 0, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 4096

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;www.demarches-simplifiees.fr.	IN	 MX
response:
;; opcode: QUERY, status: NOERROR, id: 52456
;; flags: qr rd ra; QUERY: 1, ANSWER: 2, AUTHORITY: 0, ADDITIONAL: 1

;; OPT PSEUDOSECTION:
; EDNS: version 0; flags: ; udp: 512

;; QUESTION SECTION:
;www.demarches-simplifiees.fr.	IN	 MX

;; ANSWER SECTION:
www.demarches-simplifiees.fr.	3600	IN	MX	1 mx4.mail.ovh.net.
www.demarches-simplifiees.fr.	3600	IN	MX	10 mx3.mail.ovh.net.
